text:
(TRICKSTER) You feel a faint tug at your belt, and instantly realise that unseen fingers are trying to steal your possessions! "Set a thief to catch a thief," you whisper to yourself, suddenly whirling around under the waterfall and fending the invisible hands away. One of them is cluthing something -- probably filched from another adventurer who passed this way -- and you grab this as soon as you retreat out of the water. You examine the item you have gained.

[It is a PHIAL OF CHIMERA-SPITTLE: a deadly delyaed-action poison.]
